Mod0_Description: {c_important}Sever{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for each Minion you have upon cast.
Mod1_Description: {c_important}Sever{/c} damages enemies along its path for {c_number}[{SF_16} * 100|%|]{/c} of its initial damage.
Mod2_Description: Every {c_number}4th{/c} cast of {c_important}Sever{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_14}]{/c} seconds.
name: Sever
